Header.FreeDeliveryDesc: Free delivery throughout Ukraine for most products presented in the catalog of our online store.
Header.QualityQuaranteeDesc: All the goods presented in our online store are genuine and correspond to the declared quality. We work only with official Ukrainian manufacturers.
Header.EasyReturnDesc: According to the legislation of Ukraine, our customers can easily return or exchange a product that did not fit within 14 days from the moment of purchase.
Header.ManufacturersPricesDesc: We work directly with product manufacturers, so we offer our customers the most favorable conditions for shopping.

Contacts.ContactsDescription: We value every client and value your trust. Therefore, we are ready to quickly solve any of your questions! You can contact our support service using one of the contacts below or by sending us your contact details through the feedback form 'link.'

Contacts.CooperationTitle: Advantages of cooperation with the marketplace of Ukrainian brands SHOPPING.UA
Contacts.CooperationDescription1: We are a high-tech platform for Ukrainian brands of clothing, shoes and accessories, which provides an opportunity for Ukrainian manufacturers to significantly increase the volume of sales of their products and find their potential buyers who value Made in Ukraine products.
Contacts.CooperationDescription2: The SHOPPING.UA marketplace cooperates with popular Ukrainian bloggers and celebrities, conducts joint PR projects with fashion magazines and promotions with lighting in mass media
Contacts.CooperationDescription3: Sending goods directly to the buyer without intermediary warehouses
Contacts.CooperationDescription4: Payment only for the goods purchased by the client
Contacts.CooperationDescription5: We carry out constant advertising activity to promote Ukrainian brands in social networks Facebook, Instagram and YouTube
Contacts.CooperationDescription6: The SHOPPING.UA marketplace is the best advertising platform, where only Ukrainian manufacturers are located, it provides all the opportunities for increasing the popularity of your brand
Contacts.CooperationDescription7: The possibility of connecting the functionality of all popular payment methods on the site, including payment in parts for the buyer, which increases the number of orders
Contacts.CooperationDescription8: Automated data processing and convenient connection to the marketplace in one day from registration on the platform and unloading the goods to signing the contract

Return.PageContent:
Return of goods in accordance with the Law of Ukraine

According to the Law of Ukraine 'On Consumer Protection', you can return or exchange goods within 14 days of receipt, provided the tags, packaging materials, full product set are present, and there are no signs of use.

Procedure for returning goods

  1. Cancel the order and specify the reason for return in your personal account on the website.
  2. Pack the goods to be returned in the original packaging of our online store, as well as in packaging according to the requirements of the delivery service.
  3. Include the completed return form received in the package and a document confirming the purchase (postal declaration, sales or fiscal receipt).

The cost of return shipping is paid by the sender. In case of delivery of defective or non-compliant goods, the shipping costs to the customer and the return shipping costs are covered by us.

Refunds

The refund corresponding to the order amount will be made within 7 working days to your payment card. Refunds are only made for the product. The cost of delivery, payment system fees, and bank commissions are not reimbursed.

For questions regarding the return of goods and refunds, please contact the product manufacturer.
